about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I build with AI and write about what works.
about.bio1: I'm Aaron â€” a product builder and engineer at a financial firm. I lead product teams by day and write code by night. I've always been the person who wants to understand how things work, then build something better.
about.bio2: Right now I'm deep in the AI-native world â€” building execution systems, automating workflows, and figuring out what actually works vs. what's just hype. This site is where I share those lessons.
about.now1: Building AI-native execution systems â€” tools that help product and engineering teams ship faster without cutting corners.
about.now2: Exploring how to redesign daily life with AI â€” balancing family, health, career, and personal projects.

rss.title: Subscribe via RSS

subscribe.title: Subscribe to Updates
subscribe.description: Stay updated with new posts via RSS. Email newsletter coming later.
subscribe.playbooksDesc: Step-by-step guides for product execution and AI-native systems
subscribe.lessonsDesc: Real-world insights from building products and teams
subscribe.rssExplanation: RSS (Really Simple Syndication) is an open standard for subscribing to content. Instead of checking websites manually, your RSS reader automatically fetches new posts from all your favorite sites in one place.
subscribe.rssBenefit1: No email clutter - read in your dedicated RSS reader
subscribe.rssBenefit2: No tracking or analytics - your privacy is protected
subscribe.rssBenefit3: Own your subscription - not controlled by any platform
subscribe.rssBenefit4: Works offline - download posts to read later
